summary: Alexander is a follower based on the Roman style of combat. A true legionnaire, he fights with a Gladius and a tower shield.
descriptionHtml:
Here is my first follower mod! :) 

Alexander is a follower based on the Roman style of combat: A true legionnaire, he fights with a Gladius and a tower shield.

This follower is found inside the inn at Dragonbridge. Let me know if you find any problems!

Next Update: I will be adding a quest and experiment with adding a custom voice, I'll hopefully have the voice recordings finished by this weekend.

Future Plans: 
As this is my first companion mod, he is somewhat simple (being made by the CK to run with vanilla Skyrim). I will be updating him and adding more sophisticated material in the future. I also plan to add a custom voice at some point.

I have another companion on the way. This time it will be a female standalone follower with a custom voice!
author: GeneralDraxeo
